attributes.additional_details:
We respectfully request that in light of the recent use of the UK veto a snap election be called.

The British public have in the majority supported the decision to use the veto and in so doing given an indication as to their feeling towards ongoing European issues.

Clerarly the British/Europe relationship has shifted dramatically since the last election therefore, it is deemed right and proper that the issue is put to the people.  It is also right and propper that political parties put their individual positions to the test.
